sailpoint.object
Class Duration

java.lang.Object
  sailpoint.object.Duration

public class Duration
extends java.lang.Object

A duration of time specified as a number of units (the amount) and a scale.

Format the difference between the given end date and start date as a list of durations.

Parameters:
end - The end date of the period.

locale - The Locale to use to format the string.

formatTimeDifference

public static java.lang.String formatTimeDifference(java.util.Date end,
                                                    java.util.Date start,
                                                    java.util.Locale locale,
                                                    Duration.Scale minimum)
Format the difference between the given end date and start date as a list of durations, stopping at the given minimum granularity.

Parameters:
end - The end date of the period.
start - The date to subtract from the end date.
locale - The Locale to use to format the string.
minimum - The minimum granularity to display in the formatted string. This allows truncating stuff like milliseconds.
